long_description: Upgrade your camping cookware with the Snow Peak Titanium Single 450 Cup. Single-walled titanium construction lets you reheat or boil beverages right in your cup while keeping your pack weight down. Corrosion-resistant titanium is extremely lightweight and leaves no metallic smell or taste. 2 folding handles allow easy packing; cup holds 14 oz. of liquid and weighs only 2.4 oz. Snow Peak Titanium Single 450 Cup includes a mesh bag with drawstring for easy transport.
short_description: Upgrade your camping cookware with the Snow Peak Titanium Single 450 Cup. Single-walled titanium construction lets you reheat or boil beverages right in your cup while keeping your pack weight down.
